boardgame.name: Sagrada
Саграда
サグラダ
聖家族大教堂 SAGRADA
사그라다
boardgame.description: Draft dice and use the tools-of-the-trade in Sagrada to carefully construct your stained glass window masterpiece._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In more detail, each player builds a stained glass window by building up a grid of dice on their player board. Each board has some restrictions on which color or shade (value) of die can be placed there. Dice of the same shade or color may never be placed next to each other. Dice are drafted in player order, with the start player rotating each round, snaking back around after the last player drafts two dice. Scoring is variable per game based on achieving various patterns and varieties of placement...as well as bonus points for dark shades of a particular hidden goal color._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Special tools can be used to help you break the rules by spending skill tokens; once a tool is used, it then requires more skill tokens for the next player to use them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The highest scoring window artisan wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Scheduled to arrive in Q2, 2017. Kickstarter Edition of Sagrada Board Game. Includes core game plus all stretch goals. Please contact us if you have any questions.

Played once. All components complete and in great condition. Image available upon request.
Flat shipping fee $13 for Continental USA. Free shipping with purchase of $150+. Combined shipping available. Also available for pick up in NYC (zip code: 10016). I accept Paypal, Venmo, Google wallet and Chase Quickpay. Price is negotiable if you buy multiple games.
For international shipping, UPS/USPS/Fedex rate is usually about $45~$100 depending on distance. I can also ship with other options upon request.

New. Sealed. Ready to ship! Shipping is $16 to US. Because I have received interest, I making this game available to some international buyers. International buyers must have positive feedback in the BGG marketplace to purchase this item, otherwise your order will be canceled. Shipping to Canada is $60. Shipping to Europe is $85. Payment accepted as Amazon.com GC or PayPal Friends and Family payment. Buy with confidence from BGG user with over 230 positive trade and sale feedback.

This kickstarter copy of Sagrada has been played twice. It comes with all the KS promos, including the extra promo dice tray. US shipping will be $13.60 for a medium flat rate box. Happy to ship worldwide, buyer pays full cost. Feel free to make me an offer. Open to high value trades as well.
Played once. Max shipping is $12 Any questions please ask. non-smoker

This game was played once - Kickstarter version (Includes stretch goals but NOT the 5th board*) *Please be aware that if you are looking for a version with the 5th board, it does NOT allow for 5 player games. Here is a quote from the kickstarter: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;This player board does not change gameplay or add a fifth player, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s simply a fun and unique way we would like to show how we appreciate your support on Kickstarter. Thank You!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Due to some unfortunate life events, I am forced to sell my board game collection. For several years I was paid to demo games and afterward, had the option of purchasing the game I demo’d. Because of this, most of my games are either new or have been played once. I have a large number of games for sale, some quite small, so please check my inventory to see if you’d like to purchase multiple items. I will work with you a bit on price if you do, and of course, it will save on shipping. I am an eBay top-rates seller with over 4200 positive feedback. I ship promptly and pack the items well. You will not receive beat-up games with pieces thrown all over inside the box. After purchase, buyer will be responsible for exact shipping charges. I accept PayPal only unless prearranged ahead of time.
